channel.title: NHL Playoffs
channel.description:
Yea NHL playoffs are coming about soon. And I want to give you the headsup of whose clinching into those final conference spots.
EASTERN CONFERENCE:
1. Buffalo Sabres 113* 2. New Jersey Devils 106* 3. Atlanta Thrashers 97* 4. Ottawa Senators 105* 5. Pittsburgh Penguins 105* 6. New York Rangers 94* 7. Tampa Bay Lightning 93* 8. New York Islanders 92* 9. Toronto Maple Leafs 91X 10. Montreal Canadiens 90X 11. Carolina Hurricanes 88X 12. Florida Panthers 86X 13. Boston Bruins 76X 14. Washington Capitals 70X 15. Philadelphia Flyers 54X
*=Clinched X=Eliminated
WESTERN CONFERENCE:
1. Detroit Red Wings 113* 2. Anaheim Ducks 110* 3. Nashville Predators 110* 4. Dallas Stars 105* 5. Vancouver Canucks 105* 6. San Jose Sharks 107* 7. Minnesota Wild 104* 8. Calgary Flames 96* 9. Colorado Avalanche 93X 10. St. Louis Blues 81X 11. Columbus Blue Jackets 73X 12. Chicago Blackhawks 71X 13. Edmonton Oilers 71X 14. Los Angeles Kings 68X 15. Phoenix Coyotes 65X
I will keep you up to date considering that there are just a few more games in the season till Playoffs. Also Post who do you think might even win the Stanley cup or what team you like. Or even a player.

item.title: NHL Playoffs
item.dc:creator: @zoltanman zoltanman
item.description:
@zoltanman wrote:

If Toronto made it to the playoffs they would be playing Buffalo Sabres. Buffalo has a 3-2 streak over Toronto in the Season. So that would be an amazing close race in the playoffs if Toronto made it. If only Forsberg didn’t get traded then Philadelphia would still have a chance. Now it’s all over for the other teams because nashville is takeing home the Stanley cup.

Read full topic

item.title: NHL Playoffs
item.dc:creator: @blade_arrow0 blade arrow0
item.description:
@blade_arrow0 wrote:

i cant belive ryder got a hat trick so quickly.but toronto still won!! well i live in edmonton and im supposed to cheer for the oilers and i did last year but not this year.they suck this year! so this yera im cheering for sabres,nashville,new jersy and toronto and calgary

item.title: NHL Playoffs

item.description:
@zoltanman wrote:

Most definetely. Ryder was killing us but we got back in the game in the third big time.

item.title: NHL Playoffs
item.dc:creator: @Cheesehunk Cheesehunk
item.description:
@Cheesehunk wrote:

I don’t like New Jersey anymore… :rolleyes: They didn’t even take the game seriously, and Toronto got outed because of it in my opinion… Last night’s match-up between Montreal and Toronto was an intense game.

Read full topic

item.title: NHL Playoffs
item.dc:creator: @zoltanman zoltanman
item.description:
@zoltanman wrote:

Yep that is true. I am in Toronto and well you know who I root for I guess. Well Toronto just got kicked off by 1 point now because New York Islanders Had to beat New jersey today. Fuck I feal sad. Well Now hopefully the finals it will come between Nashville predators and New Jersey Devils.

Read full topic

item.title: NHL Playoffs
item.dc:creator: @jme jme
item.description:
@jme wrote:

In my opinion this year kind of sucks for hockey. I just don’t know who I like anymore.

Basically I’ll cheer for any Canadian team I guess. Or New Jersey only because I have quite a few friends who like New Jersey, and well when your watching the game it’s more fun if everyone is cheering for the same team.

Read full topic
